original_title: The Beautiful Blonde from Bashful Bend
overview: Saloon-bar singer Freddie gets very angry whenever boyfriend Blackie seems to be playing around. She always packs a six-shooter, so this is bad news for anything that happens to be in the way. As this is usually the local judge's rear-end, Freddie and friend Conchita are soon hiding out teaching school in the middle of nowhere.
tagline: She had the biggest Six-Shooters in the West!
title: The Beautiful Blonde from Bashful Bend
